directions.step:
TEISENNAU ABERFFRO Melt the butter in a basin and beat in the sugar. Gradually add the flour, mixing well with a warm spoon, Roll out thinly on a floured board and cut into rounds. Cook in a moderate oven (375/F. or Mark 5) for 15 minutes or until golden-brown. Serve sprinkled with sugar and with whipped cream and raspberry jam. Posted to MM-Recipes Digest V3 #256
Date: Thu, 19 Sep 1996 18:42:04 +0000
From: "ray.watson" <ray.watson@ukonline.co.uk>
